item.nyagibits_bytes.inert_god_heart.des:
It's... so much colder
§3Grants Jump Boost II
§5Soulbound
item.nyagibits_bytes.faintly_resonating_:
A Song Of Anger
§3Grants Jump Boost II, Conduit
§3Power and Aqua Affinity
§5Soulbound
item.nyagibits_bytes.livisite_slate.desc:
The semi-organic nature of the stone
lends it to be melded like metal
item.nyagibits_bytes.pile_of_cogs.desc: Has a ratio of something to an amount
item.nyagibits_bytes.pile_of_crude_mecha:
A box filled with all sorts of
nick-nacks to put together more
complex machines and assemblies
item.nyagibits_bytes.sturdy_box.desc:
Reinforced wooden box perfect
for very basic item handling
and aggressive processing
item.nyagibits_bytes.sealed_pouch.desc:
Threading hemp fibers through
paper and leather to create a
pouch to burn more energetic
compounds
item.nyagibits_bytes.torn_wool_ball.desc: Little ball for generating static shocks
item.nyagibits_bytes.etched_redstone_pla:
A slab of redstone with channels
carved within it to allow for
a flow of energy
item.nyagibits_bytes.crude_silicon_boule:
Silicon is important for electronics,
however very pure forms are hard to
make. This will get you by for now
item.nyagibits_bytes.logic_dud.desc:
Stamped plate of gold, serves as the
foundation for Logic Processors
item.nyagibits_bytes.calculation_dud.des:
Stamped plate of certus, serves as the
foundation for Calculation Processors
item.nyagibits_bytes.engineering_dud.des:
Stamped plate of diamond, serves as the
foundation for Engineering Processors
item.nyagibits_bytes.bottle_of_anthocyan:
This purple juice contains anthocyanin
which functions as a natural pH indicator
item.nyagibits_bytes.bottle_of_malic_and: Tomato juice is acidic, who would of guessed
item.nyagibits_bytes.chemistry_rack.desc: Little wooden rack able to hold test tubes
item.nyagibits_bytes.basic_composite_pla:
A fantastically strong base material
for industrial applications
item.nyagibits_bytes.blank_blueprint.des:
So many possible doodles to scribble on
with all these new pens I have!
item.nyagibits_bytes.petri_dish_empty.de:
Sterilized glass disk ready
to take bacteria substrate
item.nyagibits_bytes.agar_flakes.desc: They are like potato chips but awful
item.nyagibits_bytes.petri_dish_agar_aga:
Agar-Agar substrate can be
considered the 'vanilla' type
as it is not specifically made
for any 1 type of bacteria.
item.nyagibits_bytes.sponged_steel.desc:
Aggressive chemicals ate through
this steel like worm through an
apple. Delish
item.nyagibits_bytes.sodium_polyacrylate:
Hyper absorbent polymer dust able
to hold multiple times its own weight
in water or other polar compounds
item.nyagibits_bytes.endoflame_mush.desc:
The spent remains of what was
once an endoflame
item.nyagibits_bytes.hydroangeas_mush.de:
The squishy remains of what was
once a hydroangeas
item.nyagibits_bytes.gourmaryllis_mush.d:
The self digested remains of what
was once a gourmaryllis
item.nyagibits_bytes.thermalily_mush.des:
The pompeii'ed remains of what
was once a thermalily
item.nyagibits_bytes.entropinnyum_mush.d:
The rapidly dismantled remains of
what was once an entropinnyum
item.nyagibits_bytes.munchdew_mush.desc:
The auto cannibalised remains of
what was once a munchdew
item.nyagibits_bytes.narslimmus_mush.des:
The sentient(?) remains of
what was once a narslimmus
item.nyagibits_bytes.rosa_arcana_mush.de:
The enchanted remains of
what was once a rosa arcana
item.nyagibits_bytes.manasteel_lattice.d:
A frame of manasteel perfect
for allowing energy to flow
within runes and other arcane
machines
item.nyagibits_bytes.rune_binder.desc: It's like glue but more magical
item.nyagibits_bytes.rubberized_cable.de:
Rubber insulates the cable allowing
for more efficient energy transfer.
It also stops you from burning yourself
item.nyagibits_bytes.ceramic.desc:
Clay mixed in with silica or feldspar.
This allows the material to withstand
much higher temperatures than normal
By creating tons of microscopic
pores within the charcoal it ends
up acting as a chemical sponge. Neat!
item.nyagibits_bytes.sturdy_tray.desc:
Specially treated wood is an
ideal surface to accidentally
set on fire with chemicals
item.nyagibits_bytes.beaker.desc:
Large vessel designed for moving
lots of liquid
Ideal for reactions that slosh about
or for lowering into a liquid bath
item.nyagibits_bytes.distillation_column:
The outer glass tube allows for cold
water to be flushed in, condensing
gasses and other volatiles into liquid
item.nyagibits_bytes.inlet.desc:
A connection point between chemistry
glassware. Can be greased with acid
or well... grease
item.nyagibits_bytes.burette.desc:
Long and slender piece of glassware
with a nozzle fixed to the bottom,
allowing for precise drop of drops
item.nyagibits_bytes.sterilized_quartz_g:
Pure quartzite glass perfect for
blasting to hell and back with FIRE
item.nyagibits_bytes.ph_strip.desc:
By dousing a strip of paper with
indicator compounds, we can have
mostly reliable quick pH testing
item.nyagibits_bytes.bottle_of_vinegar.d:
The fermented juices of dilute alcoholic
liquids. Primarily diluted acetic acid.
Quite sour too, yum
item.nyagibits_bytes.low_grade_coke.desc:
Standard coal isnt carbon rich enough
for good coke, but does have some uses
item.nyagibits_bytes.industrial_grade_co: Burns nice and hot for making STEEL
item.nyagibits_bytes.wrought_ball_bearin:
Looks like a ball of toffee, hmm..
ouch my teef :(
item.nyagibits_bytes.wrought_iron_rod.de:
A touch more brittle but harder and
able to be cooked to steel later on
item.nyagibits_bytes.mixed_seeds.desc:
Eh these don't need to be sorted
right now, better keep them like this
for the sake of my inventory
item.nyagibits_bytes.hard_hat.desc:
Protecting your noggin, or at
least increasing the margin of
error while drunk at work
item.nyagibits_bytes.protective_eye_wear:
Protects you from 1 instance of
flying metal shrapnel!
item.nyagibits_bytes.fire_extinguisher.d:
Class B fire extinguisher for your
inevitable industrial fire accidents
FUNCTIONALITY PLANNED IN FUTURE UPDATE
item.nyagibits_bytes.organic_vapor_respi:
Stops your lungs from being the
pollution sponge
FUNCTIONALITY PLANNED IN FUTURE UPDATE
item.nyagibits_bytes.fasteners.desc:
Collection of nuts and bolts to
hold your extremely expensive
machinery together
item.nyagibits_bytes.synchronous_electri: Electricity make magnet, magnet make spin
item.nyagibits_bytes.dampener.desc:
Absorbs the shock from large machines
to keep it from literally shaking itself
to pieces
Machine go spin, machine go weeee
item.nyagibits_bytes.v_belt.desc:
Reinforced rubber belt perfect
for connecting segments of engine
and translating force. You can
also strangle someone with this
With some electromagnet magic
a metal rod can be made to spin
item.nyagibits_bytes.flux_mixture.desc:
Reagents perfect for liquefying
and processing metals. It can also
create acetylene directly!
item.nyagibits_bytes.steel_damascus.desc:
Made from layering different types
of high carbon steel to produce
an incredibly tough product after
folding a bajillion times
item.nyagibits_bytes.steel_high_carbon_1:
Like steel, but with more carbon
(go figure...)
Is much harder but more brittle

An increased amount of nickle
within the alloy grants it more
toughness at the cost of some hardness
item.nyagibits_bytes.steel_stainless.des:
The addition of chromium and
other trace compounds grants
this steel massive corrosion
resistance
item.nyagibits_bytes.aluminum_trichlorid:
Used as catalysts in Friedel-Crafts
Alkylation reactions, allowing for
carbon groups to be attached to
other organic compounds
item.nyagibits_bytes.toluene.desc:
Benzene with an extra methyl group.
Great for making paint, rubber, leather,
and acts as a solvent
item.nyagibits_bytes.mononitrotoluene.de:
On your way to making tnt! By itself
it can be used in the production of
pigments, antioxidants, and has use
in agriculture and photography
item.nyagibits_bytes.dinitrotoluene.desc:
On your way to making tnt! Also used
to make dyes, but is primarily for
kabooms
item.nyagibits_bytes.trinitrotoluene.des:
Pure liquid explosion. Get this
into a high pressure chamber :fire_emoji:
item.nyagibits_bytes.methyl_chloride.des:
Used primarily in the production of
silicones, synthetic rubbers, and our
favorite - Leaded Gasoline
item.nyagibits_bytes.oleum.desc:
Also known as concentrated sulfuric
acid! Very angry liquid, will turn
your skin into crispy carbon and pain
item.nyagibits_bytes.chromium_trioxide.d:
Hexavalant Chromium ideal for forcing
hydroxide groups onto organic molecules
item.nyagibits_bytes.benzyl_alcohol.desc:
Useful low toxicity solvent. Found in
various fruits and is a component of
many essential oils
item.nyagibits_bytes.2_phenoxyethanol.de:
Germicidal and Germistatic. Useful as
Perfume Fixative, Insect Repellent, and
sterilization
item.nyagibits_bytes.low_voltage_capacit:
This nifty thing is able to improve
the power efficiency and provide
reliable function to circuits and
other industrial components
item.nyagibits_bytes.threaded_composite_:
By weaving together leather with
plates of duroplast you get an
impact and friction resistant
material while remaining flexible
item.nyagibits_bytes.industrial_composit:
Very big machines need very
strong material to not instantly
shred themselves apart
item.nyagibits_bytes.lead_acid_cell.desc:
Don't forget to dump these into
the ocean to recharge the eels
item.nyagibits_bytes.heavy_plating.desc:
Sometimes you really gotta make
sure nothing gets through
item.nyagibits_bytes.soldering_iron.desc:
Little hot stick to melt
low temperature alloys onto
circuit boards
item.nyagibits_bytes.low_temperature_sol:
This alloy is able to melt at
very low temperatures making it
ideal for still managing to apply
too much to the bread board and
absolutely screwing it all up
item.nyagibits_bytes.ceramic_encased_cop:
Basically a thick copper cable
encased in a hilarious amount of
ceramic to not be turned into a 
past-tense version of yourself
item.nyagibits_bytes.hydraulic_hammer.de:
It's like a hammer but somehow
with an explosion risk. Yay!
item.nyagibits_bytes.tempered_glass.desc:
This glass is able to crumble into
pieces instead of massive shards
making it far safer to use
item.nyagibits_bytes.annealed_glass.desc:
Glass tends to be quite stressed
when it is first made, so naturally
de-stressing it involves almost
melting it again and letting it
slowly relax (cool) after.
item.nyagibits_bytes.tungsten_wire.desc:
This incredibly thin wire is able
to withstand super high temperatures
which allows it to glow
item.nyagibits_bytes.solder_wire.desc:
A useful and only slightly toxic
way of sticking electronic components
onto circuit boards
item.nyagibits_bytes.fluorophlogopite.de:
This synthetic material is able
to add bulk and thicken emulsions.
item.nyagibits_bytes.synthetic_mica.desc:
Woven and spun from fluorophlogopite.
Acts as excellent insulation in high
temperature applications
item.nyagibits_bytes.tpv_cell.desc:
TPV Cells work similar to PV Cells,
but instead of visible light these
specialize in absorbing infrared
photons, acting as a heat based
'solar' panel.
item.nyagibits_bytes.polycrystalline_sil:
This semi-crude silicon crystal has
special electrical properties. With
more refinement this could allow for
your first solar panels
item.nyagibits_bytes.zinc_gallium_antimo:
A III-V semiconductor. Allows for the
absorption and interaction of infrared
photons
item.nyagibits_bytes.ash.desc:
Powdered remains of organics and
tiny pieces of dust
item.nyagibits_bytes.potash.desc:
Commonly given as a name for ash
or other minerals with a high amount
of potassium. Ideal for agriculture
item.nyagibits_bytes.wood_ash.desc:
The powdery remains of setting
wood on fire. Surprisingly useful
with some chemical processing
item.nyagibits_bytes.metamorphic_alloy.d:
Mixing together various unnatural
stones seems to give this alloy
some almost plastic like properties
item.nyagibits_bytes.ore_extraction_plat:
By combining tech and tech that
looks like magic we can pull more
materials out of ores at rates that
feel like violations of conservation
of mass
This material seems to be
attracted to sources of either
intense light or darkness...
item.nyagibits_bytes.refined_radiance.de:
A chromatic material forged
from a bright and powerful
beam of pure radiance
item.nyagibits_bytes.shadow_steel.desc:
A chromatic material forged
from the essence of where
light can never shine
item.nyagibits_bytes.smectite_clay.desc:
Also known as rubbing earth, this
clay remains abrasive while easy to
manipulate against a surface
item.nyagibits_bytes.sodium_hypochlorite:
A highly basic alkaline inorganic
compound. Will absolutely shred most organics
and leave objects clean
item.nyagibits_bytes.volcanic_pumice.des:
Still rock, but less dense
than even water! Very
abrasive material
item.nyagibits_bytes.dense_slag.desc:
You forgot to filter the
mixer didn't you? :)
item.nyagibits_bytes.skystone_encrusted_:
While no longer useful in electronics
these crystals of skystone along
the exterior seem to help channel
energy in the manasteel
item.nyagibits_bytes.botanical_core.desc:
A weird agglomeration of parts
that appear to help bridge the gap
between electronics and mana.
Neat!
item.nyagibits_bytes.everburn_tar.desc:
Wow it never stops burning!
Oh shit wait it never stops...
item.nyagibits_bytes.precise_crystal_har:
Similar to what is found in
electronic watches and clocks.
Applies a small current to take
advantage of a property known as
the Piezoelectric effect. You can
then count how often the quartz
vibrates and keep track of
time to decent accuracy
item.nyagibits_bytes.mini_faraday_cage.d:
Sheets of metal strapped together
to act as a barrier to stray radio
and microwaves
item.nyagibits_bytes.pile_of_basic_mecha:
A more sophisticated box
of random garbage
item.nyagibits_bytes.gypsum.desc:
A sulfate mineral made of
calcium sulfate dihydrate.
Has uses in agriculture,
manufacturing, and architecture
item.nyagibits_bytes.mana_imbued_glucose:
By violently dehydrating
and quenching processed
munchdew mush, we get this
interesting form of sugar. I
wonder what we can do with it...
item.nyagibits_bytes.mana_imbued_obsidia:
Cracking apart the quenched
thermalily mush we get this
unique polymorph of obsidian
with inclusions of mana and
ordered carbon structures
item.nyagibits_bytes.mana_imbued_primary:
The corpse of the entropynium
refuses to stop reacting! Thankfully
with some chemical processing it is
made into a safe to handle form
perfect for future applications
item.nyagibits_bytes.mana_imbued_oobleck:
The death of the Hydrangea
seems to of left behind this
slimy substance that once mixed
with starch behaves as a low friction
and temperature resistant non-newtonian
fluid. This must have applications...
item.nyagibits_bytes.deactivated_entropi: I think it's angry at me still..
item.nyagibits_bytes.basic_arcana_core.d:
There is so much going on
with this pile of garbage...
item.nyagibits_bytes.heptafluoropropane_:
Incredible fire suppressant
and incredible stop breathing power
item.nyagibits_bytes.oolithus.desc:
A fossilized egg! Heh
oooOOOOOOlithus, lol
item.nyagibits_bytes.coprolite.desc:
Fossilized sh*t, no actually
this is just fossilized poop
item.nyagibits_bytes.fossil_resin.desc:
Oh there seems to be some
critter trapped in the amber..
item.nyagibits_bytes.lab_notebook.desc:
Science is fucking around
and finding out, but you
also take some notes!
item.nyagibits_bytes.lab_notebook_with_c: Lab Notebook With Crude Compression Data

Note to self.. make stronger
boxes. Also the soil is hard
Lab Notebook With Crude Statics Data

Wool is surprisingly good at
making a static charge...
Also put another stack of
Buckets on the shopping list
Lab Notebook With Crude Entropy Data

The gunpowder seems to of
forced the quartz into a
less energetically favorable
formation. The rest of this I'm
not sure if it did anything..
Lab Notebook With Crude Acidics Data

Note: pH Indicator tastes terrible
Don't drink
Lab Notebook With Natural Arcana Data
Unsure if this is still technology
Lab Notebook With Crude Material Properties Data

UTS ~= 750 MPam, CS ~= 3kPSI
not very acid or lava proof sadly
item.nyagibits_bytes.lexicon.desc:
With the power of mana
we can write more words per
word. It also floats now
item.nyagibits_bytes.lexicon_with_sumad_:
20 trillion more to defense
funding pretty please
item.nyagibits_bytes.lexicon_with_mbc_da:
I could test the thermal
properties of other fluids
but honestly this one is
pretty damn good as is
item.nyagibits_bytes.lexicon_with_bmpt_d:
So the magnet broke the circuit
board, the acid liquefied
most of this, and worse
of all I don't even know
where the damn pen went
item.nyagibits_bytes.lexicon_with_basic_: Lexicon With Basic Natural Arcana Data

Such extensive consolidated knowledge
with the arcane nature of this world.
Time to exploit it to the absolute fullest
item.nyagibits_bytes.pen_assembly.desc:
I'm sure most of us have
taken apart a pen at some
point
item.nyagibits_bytes.ball_bearing.desc:
Probably useful in cartoonish traps
where someone slips down the stairs
and you get charged with homicide
item.nyagibits_bytes.thin_casing.desc:
Remember class a tube like this has
only 1 hole, it's basically a donut
item.nyagibits_bytes.ink_cartridge.desc: Don't try to smoke this, tastes bad
item.nyagibits_bytes.ae2_schematic.desc:
Now I can discombobulate my items
more efficiently!
item.nyagibits_bytes.ae2_assembly.desc:
This pile of parts is used to
bulk craft Ae2 components with
the addition of a key item and
a schematic
Redstone components retrofitted
with crystals that do harmonics
or some other jargon who knows
item.nyagibits_bytes.processor_stack.des: Not a sandwich, do not eat
item.nyagibits_bytes.energized_frame.des:
This frame is conductive so be
careful not to zap yourself
item.nyagibits_bytes.energized_wires.des:
Wires energized to energetically
move more energy
The properties of skystone allow
it to serve as lightweight shielding
against electrical interference making
it ideal for protecting electronics
item.nyagibits_bytes.matter_converters.d:
Virtually all Ae2 blocks shuttle items
around, and so, a way to atomize and
rebuild them is needed
item.nyagibits_bytes.decorative_paneling:
Put a cover on the wires so you don't
stick your fingers in it
item.nyagibits_bytes.micro_tools.desc:
Ae2 components tend to be on the delicate
side and so, need some specialized tools
to assemble and construct
item.nyagibits_bytes.botania_schematic.d:
See Botania is a tech mod! It
has the science paper with it
item.nyagibits_bytes.botania_assembly.de:
This pile of parts is used to
bulk craft Botania components with
the addition of key items and
a schematic
item.nyagibits_bytes.semi_organic_substr:
Injecting a compacted brick of soil
with minerals allows some more exotic
life to take root
item.nyagibits_bytes.soil_conditioner.de:
Modulating the pH of the soil with
a sprinkling of compounds ensures
healthy robust and plant growth
item.nyagibits_bytes.living_frame.desc:
A casing made of living wood and stone!
It seems to almost help itself to growing
around the components placed within...
item.nyagibits_bytes.terrarium.desc:
A sealed up bottle with water and moss
perpetually sustaining itself as materials
recycle over and over again
item.nyagibits_bytes.organic_pseudo_logi:
The addition of powdered flower petals
stimulates the production of Indole-3-acetic
acid present in the grafted sunflower stump.
Redstone then allows signals to be read out
from the activity of the acid forming a crude
organic light detector
item.nyagibits_bytes.sealant.desc:
Liquidized rubber works to seal pipe joints
allowing various liquids and mana to
be contained
item.nyagibits_bytes.magnetic_hematite.d:
Hematite isn't usually magnetic but can
be found as part of living organisms.
Due to it being biocompatible, a magnetic
form will allow plants to gain some
magnetic properties
item.nyagibits_bytes.mystic_fertilizer.d:
A special blend made to encourage
the growth of engineered botania
organisms
item.nyagibits_bytes.alchemistry_assembl:
This pile of parts is used to
bulk craft Alchemistry components
with the addition of key items and
a schematic
item.nyagibits_bytes.alchemistry_schemat:
With these schematics we should
be able to make pure crystal me-
item.nyagibits_bytes.electrolytic_core.d:
Metal strips positioned to allow
for electrons to be ripped off
Sometimes water is in your reaction.
This lets you dry liquids to get rid
oh the water. Dry liquid!
item.nyagibits_bytes.chemical_grade_glas:
Strong temperature resistant glass
is needed to not send shrapnel
into your face
item.nyagibits_bytes.fume_fan.desc:
The atmosphere is nature's garbage
bin - Explosions & Fire
item.nyagibits_bytes.chemically_inert_wo:
Wood charred with acid forms a layer
carbon, stopping most reactions from
eating it up
Paper and polar liquids allow for
separation of mixed liquids &
validation of purity
item.nyagibits_bytes.bunsen_burner.desc: FIRE HOT, FIRE GOOD, MORE FIRE
This pile of parts is used to
bulk craft Immersive Engineering components
with the addition of a key item and
a schematic
item.nyagibits_bytes.immersive_engineeri:
Time to do our god given duty of pumping
lead directly into the atmosphere!
item.nyagibits_bytes.high_temperature_he:
Most power is just steam, and
because of that, these were made
to make more steam more better-er
item.nyagibits_bytes.duct_tape.desc: The backbone of all boeing aircraft
item.nyagibits_bytes.wd_40.desc:
Can't get it open? Spray the nozzle
with a second smaller can of WD40
item.nyagibits_bytes.triple_bay_4s_serie:
Features and benefits
MADE IN THE USA. Every 4s series toolbox is manufactured in Jamestown, NY using domestic and global materials
SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION. Matco's T-shaped center shelf is fully welded to all sides making it the most durable and secure toolbox on the market
INTEGRATED POWER. Power drawer includes a holster for tool charging and front convenience power is standard on each toolbox (110V and USB)
MAKE IT UNIQUE. Choose from 12 paint colors and 6 trim colors to customize your toolbox
PREMIUM HANDLES. Aluminum overwrap handles are easy to grip and protect drawer top from scratches
ADDITIONAL STORAGE. Increase storage capacity by adding a top drawer, hutch, half chest, or side locker
HEAVY LOAD CAPACITY. Drawer slides are rated to hold up to 140 lbs. and each caster is rated up to 900 lbs
item.nyagibits_bytes.acetylene_tank.desc:
Surprisingly this explosive and
ludicrously flammable gas only
has a zero on health hazard. Yum
All your necessary safety equipment
to keep you just barely alive in the
factory. PPE FTW
item.nyagibits_bytes.crate_of_industrial:
You don't want to know how insanely
heavy this is to carry
item.nyagibits_bytes.crude_compression_t:
We got a box, with some dirt
lets see what the properties
of the soil is
SMASH!
A hunk of wool between electrodes
all in salty water
Make it ZAP!
This mixture of unstable
compounds should be a decent
way to measure change in
entropy of a system
BURN!
It's time for everyone's favorite
chem lab! Titrations!
item.nyagibits_bytes.crude_natural_arcan:
Got all sorts of mundane and
mystical organics in here
lets see what happens
MAGI- er TECH!
item.nyagibits_bytes.crude_material_prop:
Gotta test how well this new
composite material holds up
BURN! SLASH! SMASH!
And take some notes
item.nyagibits_bytes.used_crude_statics_:
The wool charring isn't even the
surprising part, how did the bucket
get so badly damaged
item.nyagibits_bytes.used_crude_acidics_: I.. don't think titrations work like this actually
item.nyagibits_bytes.used_crude_natural_:
It uh.. is that a cherry bonsai
I'm not gonna ask any questions
item.nyagibits_bytes.used_crude_material:
Not as durable as anticipated..
still quite useful however
item.nyagibits_bytes.mana_bomb_calorimet: How much energy is mana anyways?
item.nyagibits_bytes.used_mana_bomb_calo:
~97.6 J/g/ΔK! Rather impressive.
Sure is a pain to get boiling tho...
item.nyagibits_bytes.single_use_mana_abl:
This is just an excuse to
blow more things up really
item.nyagibits_bytes.used_single_use_man:
Wow ok the heavy plating
didn't stop that at all.
Gonna need to develop even
stronger materials...
item.nyagibits_bytes.basic_material_prop:
Got new fancy materials
time to see how they break...
item.nyagibits_bytes.used_basic_material:
Multiple of these just melted
and the fumes coming off seem
to be cancerous
nyagi_bits_bytes.tooltip.god_heart.hardc: You get one chance. Don't waste it.
item.nyagibits_bytes.raw_limonite.desc:
A hydrated iron. By mass has less
iron than a pure sample but could
potentially be an easy source of hydroxide
item.nyagibits_bytes.raw_hematite.desc:
Basically rust ore, fairly common
flavor of iron ore
item.nyagibits_bytes.raw_magnetite.desc:
Can be naturally magnetic! Crucial for
building your first polarizer
item.nyagibits_bytes.raw_pyrite.desc:
Don't be a fool this isn't gold. However
it does contain quite a decent fraction
item.nyagibits_bytes.raw_siderite.desc:
An easy to smelt variant prised by the ancient
greeks. Of course with your industrial machinery
that just means less sharpening of your milling
equipment
item.nyagibits_bytes.raw_banded_iron.des:
Ancient iron from the Precambrian 3.7 billion
years ago, surviving all this time to be turned
into a spring for your pens
item.nyagibits_bytes.raw_bog_iron.desc:
Formed by iron bacteria
§c(Thiobacillus Ferrooxidans and Thiobacillus Thiooxidans)
eating nutrients from groundwater and surface flows,
pooping out oxidized iron over time forming this ore.
Although we aren't near a swamp, it's very strange that
it ended up here....
item.nyagibits_bytes.raw_meteoric_iron.d:
A chunk fallen from the heavens. Not fantastic
for iron ironically enough but contains trace
amounts of rare metals. Will probably require
more chemical mastery to tap into
item.nyagibits_bytes.rune_blank.desc:
Slab of rock ready to take on
instructions to channel specific
types of energy
item.nyagibits_bytes.rune_optical.desc:
This rune has optically relevant
artificial crystals within able
to down-convert mana to specific
wavelength photons
item.nyagibits_bytes.rune_velocity.desc:
This rune is able to modify its
own velocity through mana conversion
item.nyagibits_bytes.rune_inertia.desc:
Much like a gyroscope this rune
is able to maintain a moment of
inertia in one axis
Using mana this rune basically
functions like a heat exchanger
you would see in a refrigerator
item.nyagibits_bytes.rune_magnetic.desc:
The electromagnetic coils in
this rune seem to function much
more efficiently when manasteel
is within the structure
item.nyagibits_bytes.rune_catalytic.desc:
Similar to 'on-carbon' catalysts
this rune is able to use mana to
swap which materials are expressed
on the surface for any given reaction
